entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:55 AM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
